sentences.caption: A small brown dog sits in front of a white television set with a remote control on the floor.
The baby is sitting on the floor, holding a toothbrush in her mouth and looking up at the camera with a big smile on her face.
The image shows a toilet with a sink and mirror above it in a tiled bathroom.
A group of people are sitting around a table in a room, discussing something on their laptops.
The image shows a collage of different colors and textures, including orange, blue, green, and purple.
The image shows a plate of French toast with bacon, bananas, and maple syrup.
A group of dogs playing in a fenced area with a small pond in the background.
A skier is riding down a snowy slope on a snowboard, wearing a blue and black pants.
A group of people are standing next to a train that is parked on the tracks.
A small white dog is standing next to a bicycle on the sidewalk.
The white cat is sitting on top of a black bag in the corner of a room.
A cat sits on top of a microwave oven in a kitchen.
A woman is sitting at a table with a plate of food in front of her.
A brown dog is sitting on a windowsill looking out at the rain.
The pizza is sitting on a blue tray with a slice missing.
An empty street with a sign that reads "no through traffic"
A group of people are walking through a park with benches and trees.
The dog is curled up under the covers on the bed, looking comfortable and relaxed.
The image shows two elephants standing on a rocky beach, with one of them holding a small rock in its trunk.
The image shows a large, ornate clock hanging on the wall of a church.
